data.message:
Hello Facebook 😫I am from Bangladesh

my account disable please back my account please😫😫😫😫

I don't know why this happened. But now I know I did something wrong that's why my ID is disabled. I read all Facebook policy. Next time it won't happen. This ID was very important to me. I do some money working job. I have to contract with my dealer so soon.

So, It'll be great if Facebook give me another chance to prove my self. thank you Facebook.

replies.message: Hi Mohammad. You learn how to appeal a disabled account from our Help Center here: http://bit.ly/2yIEKWp. -James
